title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Cross-Border
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Cross-Border 

Conversions, Mergers and Divisions) (Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (cross-border conversion merger divisions) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the European
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the European 
Union (Cross-Border Conversions, Mergers and Divisions) Regulations 2023 
(S.I. No. 233 of 2023).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean european union (cross-border conversion merger divisions) regulation 2023 (s.i no 233 2023)

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended, in Part 1, by the insertion of
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are amended, in Part 1, by the insertion of 

the following Regulation after Regulation 3: 

“Penalties 

3A. A person guilty of an offence under these Regulations shall be 

liable – 

(a) 

on summary conviction, to a class A fine or imprisonment 
for a term not exceeding 12 months or both, or 

(b) on conviction on indictment, to a fine not exceeding 
€50,000 or imprisonment for a term not exceeding 3 years 
or both.”.
text_norm: 3 principal regulation amended part 1 insertion following regulation regulation 3 penalty 3a person guilty offence regulation shall liable - (a) summary conviction class fine imprisonment term exceeding 12 month (b) conviction indictment fine exceeding eur50 000 imprisonment term exceeding 3 year both

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 4. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion
text_raw:
4. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion 

of the following definition: 

“ ‘converting company’, in relation to a cross-border conversion, means a 
company that is carrying out, or is proposing to carry out, the crossborder conversion;”.
text_norm: 4 regulation 4 principal regulation amended insertion following definition converting company relation cross-border conversion mean company carrying proposing carry crossborder conversion

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 5. Regulation 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the
text_raw:
5. Regulation 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the 
substitution of “an offence” for “a category 2 offence” in each place where it 
occurs. 

1 OJ No. L. 169, 30.6.2017, p. 46. 
2 OJ No. L. 321, 12.12.2019, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th September, 2023.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Cross-Border Conversions, 
Mergers and Divisions) Regulations 2023, (S.I. No. 233 of 2023). 

Regulation 3A “Penalties” is introduced and Regulations 9, 11, 21, 44, 66 and 
91 are amended to align accordingly. 

Regulation 4 is amended to include a definition of ‘converting company’. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [469] 5
